recordCreates.name: Create_Questionaire_Record_For_Contract_Signing

value.stringValue: Signed?

value.stringValue: Reason Won

value.stringValue: Please Comment

recordCreates.name: Create_Questionnaire_Record_For_Deal_Closing
recordCreates.label: Create Questionnaire Record For Deal Closing

value.stringValue: What are the objections we should expect and how do you plan to overcome them?

recordCreates.name: Create_Questionnaire_Record_For_Deal_Closing_0
recordCreates.label: Create Questionnaire Record For Deal Closing

value.stringValue: What are our competitors doing at this stage? Is our competitive strategy working?

recordCreates.name: Create_Questionnaire_Record_For_Deal_Closing_1
recordCreates.label: Create Questionnaire Record For Deal Closing

value.stringValue: If custom dev or integration required, is it scoped/agreed with Product/Solutions or BD?

recordCreates.name: Create_Questionnaire_Record_For_Deal_Closing_2
recordCreates.label: Create Questionnaire Record For Deal Closing

value.stringValue: Have we scoped an onboarding/implementation plan?

recordCreates.name: Create_Questionnaire_Record_For_Deal_Closing_3
recordCreates.label: Create Questionnaire Record For Deal Closing

value.stringValue: Who will approve the deal and are they briefed on the pricing & terms?

recordCreates.name: Create_Questionnaire_Record_For_Deal_Closing_4
recordCreates.label: Create Questionnaire Record For Deal Closing

value.stringValue: Is there a sense of urgency and how to create one?

recordCreates.name: Create_Questionnaire_Record_For_Final_Negotiations
recordCreates.label: Create Questionnaire Record For Final Negotiations

value.stringValue: When would we expect to sign?

recordCreates.name: Create_Questionnaire_Record_For_Final_Negotiations_0
recordCreates.label: Create Questionnaire Record For Final Negotiations

value.stringValue: When would we expect to launch?

recordCreates.name: Create_Questionnaire_Record_For_Final_Negotiations_1
recordCreates.label: Create Questionnaire Record For Final Negotiations

value.stringValue: What are the priorities in final negotiation? What is the bottom line price?

recordCreates.name: Create_Questionnaire_Record_For_Final_Negotiations_2
recordCreates.label: Create Questionnaire Record For Final Negotiations

value.stringValue: What revenue are you willing to commit to this Quarter/Year?

recordCreates.name: Create_Questionnaire_Record_For_Final_Negotiations_3
recordCreates.label: Create Questionnaire Record For Final Negotiations

value.stringValue: Final scoping & implementation plan agreed with client?

recordCreates.name: Create_Questionnaire_Record_For_Final_Negotiations_4
recordCreates.label: Create Questionnaire Record For Final Negotiations

value.stringValue: Any contract blockers? Are these escalated?

recordCreates.name: Create_Questionnaire_Record_For_Lead_Scoping
recordCreates.label: Create Questionnaire Record For Lead Scoping

value.stringValue: Is it local, regional or global?

recordCreates.name: Create_Questionnaire_Record_For_Lead_Scoping_0
recordCreates.label: Create Questionnaire Record For Lead Scoping

value.stringValue: If agency is it a single end client or multi-end client opportunity?

recordCreates.name: Create_Questionnaire_Record_For_Lead_Scoping_1
recordCreates.label: Create Questionnaire Record For Lead Scoping

value.stringValue: If agency is it one-off end client/campaign opp or run-rate opp ?

recordCreates.name: Create_Questionnaire_Record_For_Lead_Scoping_2
recordCreates.label: Create Questionnaire Record For Lead Scoping

value.stringValue: If agency is it below or above 25k ACV (actual cash value)

recordCreates.name: Create_Questionnaire_Record_For_Qualification
recordCreates.label: Create Questionnaire Record For Qualification

value.stringValue: Who is leading the process?

recordCreates.name: Create_Questionnaire_Record_For_Qualification_0
recordCreates.label: Create Questionnaire Record For Qualification

value.stringValue: Who (internal or external) do we need as advocates?

recordCreates.name: Create_Questionnaire_Record_For_Qualification_1
recordCreates.label: Create Questionnaire Record For Qualification

value.stringValue: Is it a formal or informal process? (RFP vs Informal Sales vs Farming via Agency)

recordCreates.name: Create_Questionnaire_Record_For_Qualification_2
recordCreates.label: Create Questionnaire Record For Qualification

value.stringValue: How well does our standard Product fit their needs?

recordCreates.name: Create_Questionnaire_Record_For_Qualification_3
recordCreates.label: Create Questionnaire Record For Qualification

value.stringValue: Does the prospect have budget allocated against the opportunity?

recordCreates.name: Create_Questionnaire_Record_For_Qualification_4
recordCreates.label: Create Questionnaire Record For Qualification

value.stringValue: What is the compelling event?

recordCreates.name: Create_Questionnaire_Record_For_Qualification_5
recordCreates.label: Create Questionnaire Record For Qualification

value.stringValue: When does the client expect to take the decision? How critical is this deadline and why?

recordCreates.name: Create_Questionnaire_Record_For_True_Sales_Case
recordCreates.label: Create Questionnaire Record For True Sales Case

value.stringValue: Who else is in consideration, what is our competitive strategy ? A) have you positioned our offering against the scope? B) How have you positioned our offer against competitors?

recordCreates.name: Create_Questionnaire_Record_For_True_Sales_Case_0
recordCreates.label: Create Questionnaire Record For True Sales Case

value.stringValue: Do we expect any custom dev/integrations?

recordCreates.name: Create_Questionnaire_Record_For_True_Sales_Case_1
recordCreates.label: Create Questionnaire Record For True Sales Case

value.stringValue: How well does our service offering meet their needs? (Geos/Support)

recordCreates.name: Create_Questionnaire_Record_For_True_Sales_Case_2
recordCreates.label: Create Questionnaire Record For True Sales Case

value.stringValue: What additional informal factors might influence decision ?

recordCreates.name: Create_Questionnaire_Record_For_True_Sales_Case_3
recordCreates.label: Create Questionnaire Record For True Sales Case

value.stringValue: Does our pricing meet their needs? In the right ballpark?

recordCreates.name: Create_Questionnaire_Record_For_True_Sales_Case_4
recordCreates.label: Create Questionnaire Record For True Sales Case

value.stringValue: Do you have enough inside support? Are our sponsors key decision makers?

recordCreates.name: Create_Questionnaire_Record_For_True_Sales_Case_5
recordCreates.label: Create Questionnaire Record For True Sales Case

value.stringValue: Describe the decisions makers and their roles. Who is the final decision maker, Who needs to approve? (i.e. users, who, technical staff, compliance?) Can you map the decision makers informal decisions criteria well as the formal criteria?

fields.name: Explanation10
fields.fieldText: Please review the questions below, fill in the answers, press Next and Finish.

fields.name: Reason_Lost
fields.fieldText: Reason Lost

fields.name: Please_Comment_lost
fields.fieldText: Please Comment

fields.name: Winning_Competitor
fields.fieldText: Winning Competitor

fields.name: Explanation9
fields.fieldText: Please review the questions below, fill in the answers, press Next and Finish.

fields.name: Reason_Won
fields.fieldText: Reason Won

fields.name: Please_Comment_Won
fields.fieldText: Please Comment

fields.name: Explanation8
fields.fieldText: Please review the questions below, fill in the answers, press Next and Finish.

fields.name: Signature
fields.fieldText: Signed?

fields.name: Launch_Plan
fields.fieldText: On track per commit & timeline?

fields.name: Explanation5
fields.fieldText: Please review the questions below, fill in the answers, press Next and Finish.

fields.name: Expected_Objections
fields.fieldText: What are the objections we should expect and how do you plan to overcome them?

fields.name: Competitive_Strategy
fields.fieldText: What are our competitors doing at this stage? Is our competitive strategy working?

fields.name: Custom_Dev
fields.fieldText: If custom dev or integration required, is it scoped/agreed with Product/Solutions or BD?

fields.name: Onboarding
fields.fieldText: Have we scoped an onboarding/implementation plan?

fields.name: Approver
fields.fieldText: Who will approve the deal and are they briefed on the pricing & terms?

fields.name: Urgency
fields.fieldText: Is there a sense of urgency and how to create one?

fields.name: Explanation7
fields.fieldText: Please review the questions below, fill in the answers, press Next and Finish.

fields.name: Signing_date
fields.fieldText: When would we expect to sign?

fields.name: Launching_date
fields.fieldText: When would we expect to launch?

fields.name: Final_priorities
fields.fieldText: What are the priorities in final negotiation? What is the bottom line price?

fields.name: Revenue
fields.fieldText: What revenue are you willing to commit to this Quarter/Year?

fields.name: Final_scoping
fields.fieldText: Final scoping & implementation plan agreed with client?

fields.name: Blockers
fields.fieldText: Any contract blockers? Are these escalated?

fields.name: Explanation
fields.fieldText:
Please review the questions below, fill in the answers, press Next and Finish.

﻿

fields.name: Geography
fields.fieldText: Is it local, regional or global?

fields.name: Scope_I
fields.fieldText: If agency is it a single end client or multi-end client opportunity?

fields.name: Agency
fields.fieldText: If agency is it one-off end client/campaign opp or run-rate opp ?

fields.name: Actual_Cash_Value
fields.fieldText: If agency is it below or above 25k ACV (Actual cash value)

fields.name: Explanation3
fields.fieldText: Please review the questions below, fill in the answers, press Next and Finish.

fields.name: Driver
fields.fieldText: Who is leading the process?

fields.name: Advocates
fields.fieldText: Who (internal or external) do we need as advocates?

fields.name: Process
fields.fieldText: What is the decision making process? Is it a formal or informal process? (RFP vs Informal Sales vs Farming via Agency)

fields.name: Products
fields.fieldText: How well does our standard Product fit their needs?

fields.name: Budget
fields.fieldText: Does the prospect have budget allocated against the opportunity?

fields.name: Compelling_Event
fields.fieldText: What is the compelling event?

fields.name: Decision_timeline
fields.fieldText: When does the client expect to take the decision? How critical is this deadline and why?

fields.name: Finish
fields.fieldText:
Thank you for your answers.


Click finish

fields.name: Explanation4
fields.fieldText: Please review the questions below, fill in the answers, press Next and Finish.

fields.name: Competitive_Strategy_True_Sales_case
fields.fieldText: Who else is in consideration, what is our competitive strategy ? A) have you positioned our offering against the scope? B) How have you positioned our offer against competitors?

fields.name: Custom_Dev_True_Sales_Case
fields.fieldText: Do we expect any custom dev/integrations?

fields.name: Meet_needs
fields.fieldText: How well does our service offering meet their needs? (Geos/Support)

fields.name: Additional_factors
fields.fieldText: What additional informal factors might influence decision ?

fields.name: Pricing_meet_needs
fields.fieldText: Does our pricing meet their needs? In the right ballpark?

fields.name: Internal_support
fields.fieldText: Do you have enough inside support? Are our sponsors key decision makers?

fields.name: Decision_makers
fields.fieldText: Describe the decisions makers and their roles. Who is the final decision maker, Who needs to approve? (i.e. users, who, technical staff, compliance?) Can you map the decision makers informal decisions criteria well as the formal criteria?

value.stringValue: Please review the questions below, press next and finish to indicate your acknowledgement. Feel free to fill in the answers as well.
